content.title: Standing Lean Back Stomach Stretch Instructions

items: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms at your sides.
Take a deep breath in and raise your arms above your head.
As you exhale, lean back slowly, keeping your arms straight and your core engaged.
Continue leaning back until you feel a stretch in your stomach muscles.
Hold the stretch for 10-15 seconds, breathing deeply.
Slowly return to the starting position, lowering your arms back down to your sides.
Repeat the stretch 2-3 times, as needed.
